title: Slate Money: SWAG: Gold
description:
In this Slate Money mini-series, Felix Salmon will investigate SWAG -- Silver Wine Art Gold -- and other things people invest in. 
This week, Felix talks to Justina Vasquez of Bloomberg News about how and why people have been investing in gold for a very, very long time.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
